document_data.name: Sorval Maethur
document_data.mainbody: '''Sorval Maethur''' was a merchant in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Sorval Maethur participated in the [[Marsember]] meeting of the [[Rightful Conspiracy]] during the early spring of {{yearlink|1373}}. He was assassinated there while talking to two other people, one of which was injured and the other of which fled; the murder was witnessed by one [[Narnra Shalace]], a [[thief]] from [[Waterdeep]] that had followed the wizard [[Elminster Aumar]] through a portal.
